title: My Golden Life
resume: Seo Ji Ahn, a former rich girl, was forced to be her family's breadwinner after her father's bankruptcy. She is now a contractual employee and living her life with restrained emotion. The drama chronicles her struggles to find new meaning and happiness in life.
